iterations.description: Classic WinForms race condition where Dispose() is called on a connection panel/tab control while its handle is still being created, likely during rapid connect/disconnect or app shutdown.

notes:
AI triage (claude): Classic WinForms race condition where Dispose() is called on a connection panel/tab control while its handle is still being created, likely during rapid connect/disconnect or app shutdown.
Approach: Guard Dispose() calls with IsHandleCreated check and marshal via BeginInvoke when InvokeRequired; ensure connection UI controls are disposed on the UI thread after handle creation completes.
